content: fo once you re satisfied with the level of sparkles and glitters see next section you can sew or glue the cloak between the arms on the back of the doll 18 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs the cloak also forms a train and should result slightly longer than the dress train once applied between the shoulders glitter up you can make elsa s dress and cloak a bit more magical by adding some sparkles on the cloak i embroidered some snowflakes using a silver embroidery thread on one side only the one visible from the front and added just one or two silver glitters on the dress i added some glitters on the perimeter and on the color change i glued them one by one adding textile glue with a pin and then positioning the glitter on top of it with some tweezers in this way i had good control over the final effect i d advise you to make a few tries before using the glue 19 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs congratulations your elsa is ready don t forget to send me a picture and tag me / give me credits / use my hashtag when posting online all info is in the license 20 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs skirt chart the dotted line indicates when to work tapestry over the other color 21
